name: ScrapWars
description:
You are a little Green robot with a dash and a gun. Enemies will work towards you and try to kill you. Each wave, more and more enemies will try to walk towards you, so the only way to keep killing them, is Using them as weapons.

Enemies randomly drop their (Green) weapon for you to pick up. However, instead of having two different weapons, these two weapons will be joined together into One Super Weapon! 

But Watch Out! Enemies can also pick up (purple) scrap from their fallen teammates, which will result into an improved Enemy, consisting of 2 enemies joined together.

Are You Smart enough to all enemies with a Healing, Long Range, FlameThrower-Shotgun?
